TEXT.TITLE: TEXTRON <TXT> VICE-CHAIRMAN RESIGNS
TEXT.BODY: Textron Inc said E. Paul Casey resigned as vice-chairman and a director to pursue other interests. Casey assumed his duties at Textron in October, 1986, following acquisition of Ex-Cell-O Corp by Textron. Casey was formerly chairman, president and chief executive of Ex-Cell-O. Reuter
